verses.verse: (1 He exhorteth the Levites watching in the Temple, to praise the Lord. ) Behold, praise ye the Lord, all ye servants of the Lord, ye that by night stand in the house of the Lord.
Lift up your (For their charge was not only to keep the Temple, but to pray there, and to give God thanks.) hands to the Sanctuary, and praise the Lord.

The Lord that (And therefore hath all power, bless thee with his Fatherly love declared in Zion. Thus the Levites used to praise the Lord, and bless the people.) hath made heaven and earth, bless thee out of Zion.
